isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - UNDER STEERING COLUMN TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Under Steering Column Trim Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 95
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide under steering column trim panel (Item 6) over pedals and install under steering column.

note.para: Install plastic vent louver in the vent louver opening (Item 7) of the under steering column trim panel (Item 6).

step1.para: Install one pan head torx screw (Item 5) into lower left bottom of under steering column trim panel (Item 6), this pan head torx screw goes through the floor mat (Item 14) and tighten.
Install three pan head torx screw (Item 5) along right side of under steering column trim panel (Item 6) and tighten.
Install six pan head torx screw (Item 5) across top of under steering column trim panel (Item 6) and tighten.

Install the driver side kick panel. Refer to
DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE KICK PANEL
. For installing driver side kick panel, refer to Install Driver Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
